documents.name: Terms

points.title: Harming minors in any ways is prohibited
points.quoteText: (h) not to act in any way that might be harmful to minors, including, without limitation, transmitting or facilitating the transmission of child pornography, which is prohibited by federal law and may be reported to the authorities should it be discovered by the Archive.

points.title: You are prohibited from sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages
points.quoteText: (f) not to transmit or facilitate the transmission of unsolicited email ("spam"),

points.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
points.quoteText: In addition, you agree that should any provision in the Agreement be found invalid, unlawful, or unenforceable, that provision shall not affect the validity or enforceability of the remaining provisions.

points.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
points.quoteText: The Archive does not endorse or sponsor any content in the Collections, nor does it guarantee or warrant that the content available in the Collections is accurate

points.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms
This service takes credit for your content

points.title: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
points.quoteText:
The Archive may modify this Agreement from time to time, and your continued use of the Collections and/or the Site constitutes your acceptance of any and all modifications.
The Archive will attempt to notify you of substantial modifications via the email address that you have registered with us, if any.

points.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect
points.quoteText: The Archive may collect personally identifying information when a Researcher registers for access to the Collections, including the Researcher’s name, address, telephone number, and email address, and the Researcher’s proposal for using the Collections.

points.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
points.quoteText:
In addition, the Collections are provided to you on an as-is and as-available basis.
You agree that your use of the Site and the Collections is at your sole risk.

points.title: The service provides a free help desk
points.quoteText: Please contact us with any comments or questions at info@archive.org.

points.title: This service provides archives of their terms of service so that changes can be viewed over time
points.status: A marked-by-date archive of the ToS page can be easily viewed without previous registration on "https://web.archive.org/web/*/https://archive.org/about/terms.php"

points.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
points.quoteText: You understand and agree that the Archive makes no warranty or representation regarding the accuracy, currency, completeness, reliability, or usefulness of the content in the Collections, that the Site or the Collections will meet your requirements, that access to the Collections will be uninterrupted, timely, secure, or error free, or that defects, if any, will be corrected.

points.title: You are allowed to quote their content with attribution
points.quoteText: In addition, we request that, according to standard academic practice, if you use the Archive's Collections for any research that results in an article, a book, or other publication, you list the Archive as a resource in your bibliography.

points.title: Users agree not to submit illegal content
points.quoteText:
You agree to abide by all applicable laws and regulations, including intellectual property laws, in connection with your use of the Archive.
In particular, you certify that your use of any part of the Archive's Collections will be limited to noninfringing or fair use under copyright law.
If a Creative Commons or other license has been declared for particular material on the Archive, to the extent you trust the declaration and declarer (which is rarely the Internet Archive), you may use the content according to the terms and conditions of the applicable license.

points.title: This service can use your content for all their existing and future services
points.quoteText: If you provide any content to the Archive, you grant the Archive a nonexclusive, royalty-free right to use that content.

points.title: Users shall not interfere with another person's enjoyment of the service
points.quoteText: (g) not to harass, threaten, or otherwise annoy anyone

points.title: This service requires first-party cookies
points.quoteText: The Archive may use "cookies" to track Users' activities on the Site and in the Collections.

points.title: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes
points.quoteText: You agree that this Agreement is governed by California law and that any suit arising from this Agreement will be brought in San Francisco, California, and you further agree that on the election and reasonable notice of either party any litigation shall be referred to arbitration pursuant to the California Code of Civil Procedure, §§1280 et seq.

points.title: If you are the target of a copyright claim, your content may be removed
points.quoteText: The Internet Archive may, in appropriate circumstances and at its discretion, remove certain content or disable access to content that appears to infringe the copyright or other intellectual property rights of others.

points.title: The service allows you to use pseudonyms
points.status: The signup page (https://archive.org/account/signup) allows you to enter a "screen name" and it anotates: "(this is how others will see you) 3 to 127 characters"

points.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
points.quoteText: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless the Internet Archive and its parents, subsidiaries, affiliates, agents, officers, directors, and employees from and against any and all liability, loss, claims, damages, costs, and/or actions (including attorneys’ fees) arising from your use of the Archive’s services, the site, or the Collections.
